TextView.android:text: These babies are sure to make your eyes pop! At over 1 inch tall per ring, these golden fried beer batter onion rings are piled high to the sky and just might make you cry!

How do you make the ultimate comfort food even better? Well bread it and fry it of course! Crispy on the outside, ooeey gooey in the middle, our mac and cheese bites are sure to reinvent what mac and cheese can be! Served with marinara sauce for your dipping delight!

This matchless starter will take you to the land of ferris wheels, roller coasters and neon lights! A golden fried state fair food cheesy adventure, served steamin hot with marinara dipping sauce. Guaranteed to take you to a squeaky happy place!
Think of everything you would want from a pickle, and then deep fry it. Tangy, delicious pickles breaded and fried until crispy and golden. Served with a side of jalapeno ranch for a bit of a kick.
Always a fovorite and never disappoints, the traditional classic sandwich sports slow smoked and hand pulled pork piled high in between a house made herb bun.
Low and slow brisket, thinly sliced and piled high, complimented with bacon, Swiss cheese and grilled onions.
Our perfefctly seasoned sirloin steak grilled to a medium well and tossed with a pile of grilled onions and peppers, pepper-jack cheese and avocado salsa verde wrapped together in a grilled tortilla.

The Turkey, Bacon and Avocado sandwich is a true love story of an unlikely union of opposites that brouht together by chance create a magic together. Hickorysmoked, season infused turkey thinly sliced and stacked on fresh garlic/butter grilled sourdough bread, befriend by slices of bacon and fresh avocado.
For the light appetite, choose our smollaer 1/4 lb. patty served with lettuce, tomato, onion and pickle.
1/2lb. patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickle.
A favorite around here. A half pound patty with cheddar cheese, smoky bacon, golden onion rings, lettuce, tomato and somethered in our Sweet Hickory Sauce

If you want a burger that flirts with the wild side, you have found it! Start with our signature half pound patty and stack it with grilled pastrami, wrapped tightly around a 4 ounce portion of slow smoked pulled pork, crispy bacon, lettuce, pickle, tomato, onion, swiss and placed carefully between buns grilled with golden honey and mustard. You will not soon forget your date with the badger!

Take a 1.2lb. patty add a few ounces of our 16-hour smoked brisket, lettuce, tomato and a slice of cheddar. Then top that with golden onion rings and drizzle of some of the Sweet Hickory sauce. its a thing of beauty, really-beefy, beefy beauty.
1/2lb. patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickle between two of our grilled cheese sandwiches. Yup, grilled cheese sandwiches.
A crisp house cut blend of lettuce topped with your choice of tender smoked or crispy chicken breast, diced bacon, black olives, avocado, egg and blue cheese crumbles.
A pie tin pilled high with tangy sweet pork, crispy hand cut Romaine lettuce, tortilla chips, black beans, tomatoes, Queso Fresco Cheese, and served with cilantro-lime dressing and a wedge of lime.

With steak, bigger is always better! Perfectly Marbled and flavorful cut of steak grilled to perfection on a searing hot flat iron to seal in the moisture and flavor. Served in a ginourmous 16 oz cut, this utopian steak will not leave you searching for more!

Applauded as one of the most tender cuts of steak, our famous Hickory Smoked Prime Rib is a generous 14oz cut of smoked prime rib spiked with a signature Hickory blend of garlic and seasoning and roasted to juicy perfection. Served with a tangy Au Jus and/or horseradish sauce. Served Friday's and Saturday Nights after 4:00 PM. While supplies last!
For those craving some serious BBQ beef, our brisket is smoked for 18 hours until it's tender, and dripping with flavor.
Crispy on the outside - tenderized 8oz. steak on the inside. Served with country gravy upon request.
Creamy and gooey like true comfort food. Then topped with bread crumnbs and more cheddar for extra flavor.
This is not Clark Griswold's Turkey! Enjoy generous slices of moist and tender smoked turkey injected with a buttery seasoned rub and cooked to perfection!
See if you can climb this massive warm brownie crowned at the summit with Reed's Dairy ice cream and drizzled generously with thick hot fudge!
For the seeker of the chocolate coma......, start with an Oreo crust, then move to a dark chocolate pudding layer, covered with a creamy mile chocolate mousse and then crowned with whipped cream!
An absolutely ginormous slice of moist dark chocolate cake topped with profuse amounts of homemade milk chocolate frosting complemented with a scoop of Reed's Dairy vanilla ice cream.
The magical mountain huckleberry is the perfect balance to this creamy slice of homemade New York Cheesecake. Sure to leave you night at the Hickory in a euphoric state!
